text: Patricia "Tricia" Nixon Cox was born on February 21, 1946 in Whittier, California. She is the daughter of former US president Richard Nixon and Pat Nixon. She is the older sister of Julie Nixon Eisenhower. Unlike her sister, Tricia performed many ceremonial jobs, like going with her father to campaign stops and state visits. She married Edward F. Cox on June 12, 1971. she has 1 son She tutored inner-city children. ==Other websites== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Children of Presidents of the United States Category:People from Whittier, California
title: Tricia Nixon Cox
